Interface com.chimu.form.database.support.GeneratorFromDatabase

public interface GeneratorFromDatabase
extends Generator
A GeneratorFromDatabase generates values by using a database to store counters or seeds. This allows a current generation to be related to generations which occured on previous runs of the application or to generations caused by other clients.

GeneratorFromDatabase has to handle two major issues. How generation will occur locally and how generated values effect the database values.

See Also:
DatabaseSupportPack, Generator

setupNext_limit_needToFetch_functors 
 public abstract void setupNext_limit_needToFetch_functors(Function1Arg nextValueFunction,
                                                           Function1Arg limitValueFunction,
                                                           Predicate2Arg needToFetchPredicate)
Set up the generation functions for incrementing, finding a limit, and testing against the limit.

NeedToFetchPredicate can be null which means use currentValue.equals(limitValue) as the predicate
